text: The provisions of § 47-2026 are hereby incorporated in and made applicable to this chapter; provided, that vendors and persons who have been issued certificates of registration under Chapter 20 of this title shall not be required to have such certificates under this chapter.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
